name: The History Boys
tagline: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.

name: Talaash
tagline: A cop, investigating the mysterious death of a filmstar, meets a sex-worker, while he faces some personal problems psychologically. The mystery connects these people in a way, that ultimately changes their lives.

name: The Show
tagline: A documentary about the culture of hip-hop. Through interviews with some of hip-hops biggest names, the film makers attempt to find out why it has become so popular.

name: Half Nelson
tagline: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

name: Bobby Jones: Stroke of Genius
tagline: Jim Caviezel stars as golf legend Bobby Jones, the icon who retired from competition at the tender age of 28.

name: Blind Fury
tagline: A blind Vietnam vet, trained as a swordfighter, comes to America and helps to rescue the son of a fellow soldier.

name: Prom Night II
tagline: Thirty years after her accidental death at the 1957 senior prom, the tortured spirit of prom queen, Mary Lou Maloney, returns and she is out for revenge.

name: Junebug
tagline: A dealer in "outsider" art travels from Chicago to North Carolina to meet her new in-laws, challenging the equilibrium of this middle class Southern home.

name: The Way Back
tagline: Siberian gulag escapees travel 4,000 miles by foot to freedom in India.

name: The Scout
tagline: The story of a baseball scout who discovers a talented but troubled baseball player.

name: When We Were Kings
tagline: A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.

name: Easy Virtue
tagline: A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window.

name: Kids in the Hall: Brain Candy
tagline: A pharmaceutical scientist creates a pill that makes people remember their happiest memory, and although it's successful, it has unfortunate side effects.

name: Dhoom:2
tagline: ACP Jai Dixit and his best friend Ali takes on an international thief known only as Mr. A. Will they be able to catch him?

name: Goliyon Ki Rasleela Ram-Leela
tagline: Ram and Leela, their love, lust and the drama afterwards. Modern adaptation of William Shakespeare's 'Romeo & Juliet'.

name: Captivity
tagline: A man and a woman awaken to find themselves captured in a cellar. As their kidnapper drives them psychologically mad, the truth about their horrific abduction is revealed.

name: Love Stinks
tagline: Seth Winnick has it all: a successful career in television, good friends, and a passionate relationship with beautiful Chelsea. However, when he fails to make a timely marriage proposal, Chelsea tries to make his life hell.

name: The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland
tagline: The Care Bears and Alice set out to stop an evil wizard from taking over Wonderland.

name: Samsara
tagline: Filmed over nearly five years in twenty-five countries on five continents, and shot on seventy-millimetre film, Samsara transports us to the varied worlds of sacred grounds, disaster zones, industrial complexes, and natural wonders.

name: Girls! Girls! Girls!
tagline: When he finds out his boss is retiring to Arizona, a sailor has to find a way to buy the Westwind, a boat that he and his father built. He is also caught between two women: insensitive club singer Robin and sweet Laurel.

name: Richard III
tagline: The classic Shakespearean play about a murderously scheming king staged in an alternative fascist England setting.

name: Girl in Progress
tagline: As single mom Grace juggles work, bills, and her affair with a married doctor, her daughter, Ansiedad, plots a shortcut to adulthood after finding inspiration in the coming-of-age stories she's reading for school.

name: Control Room
tagline: A documentary on perception of the United States's war with Iraq, with an emphasis on Al Jazeera's coverage.

name: House of Games
tagline: A psychiatrist comes to the aid of a compulsive gambler and is led by a smooth-talking grifter into the shadowy but compelling world of stings, scams, and con men.

name: Calendar Girl
tagline: Three young men go on an end of the summer trip to Hollywood, CA. Their quest: to fulfill the fantasy of meeting Marilyn Monroe.

name: Brassed Off
tagline: The coal mine in a northern English village may be closing, which would also mean the end of the miners' brass band.

name: King of New York
tagline: A former drug lord returns from prison determined to wipe out all his competition and distribute the profits of his operations to New York's poor and lower classes in this stylish and ultra violent modern twist on Robin Hood.

name: The Raid 2
tagline: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

name: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
tagline: A documentary on 85-year-old sushi master Jiro Ono, his business in the Ginza Tokio Subway station, and his relationship with his son and eventual heir, Yoshikazu.

name: Carnage
tagline: After a bull dies in an arena, its remains are transported throughout Belgium, France, and Spain, where various characters cross its path.

name: True Stories
tagline: A small but growing Texas town, filled with strange and musical characters, celebrates its sesquicentennial and converge on a local parade and talent show.

name: Love and Death on Long Island
Naked Lunch
tagline: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally murders his wife and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

name: Siegfried & Roy: Masters of the Impossible
Ruby Sparks
tagline: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.

name: The Dreamers
tagline: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.

name: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
tagline: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline rich, community escape a band of bandits.

name: Aces: Iron Eagle III
tagline: Chappy discovers a drug-smuggling scheme at his own air base. It turns out that the lives of some village people in Peru are at stake, and he decides to fly there with ancient airplanes and friends to free them.

name: Ra.One
tagline: A video game developer's world spirals out of control when his shape-shifting indestructible virtual creation becomes all too real.

name: Grace Unplugged
tagline: Grace Trey is the ideal Christian teen who is also a phenomenal singer. But at the tender age of eighteen, after she gets the music break of a lifetime and is thrust into the "real world" - her faith is put to the test.

name: Full Frontal
tagline: A day in the life of a group of men and women in Hollywood, in the hours leading up to a friend's birthday party.

name: Career Girls
tagline: 2 young women reunite and rekindle their friendship after having said goodbye at their college graduation, six years earlier.

name: Ridicule
tagline: To get royal backing on a needed drainage project, a poor French lord must learn to play the delicate games of wit at court at Versailles.

name: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
tagline: Rick Richards is a helicopter pilot who wants to set up a charter flying service in Hawaii -- along the way he makes some friends, including a young Hawaiian girl and her father, romances Judy Hudson, and sings a few songs.

name: Rumble Fish
tagline: Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.

name: The King of Comedy
tagline: Aspiring comic Rupert Pupkin wants to achieve success in showbiz, by resorting to stalking his idol, a late night talk show host who craves his own privacy.

name: The Kid
tagline: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

name: Behind Enemy Lines
tagline: Col. Carradine leads a group of American P.O.W.s, battling their way to freedom as Saigon falls to the Viet Cong.

name: Moonlight and Valentino
tagline: A young widow still grieving over the death of her husband finds herself being comforted by a local housepainter.

name: My One and Only
tagline: An unusual road trip movie about a mother driving her two sons from New York to Pittsburgh to St. Louis and eventually Hollywood in her quest to find a man to take care of them all.

name: Son of the Pink Panther
tagline: Charles Dreyfus encounters Jacques Gambrelli, who reminds him painfully of Inspector Clouseau, the man who drove him insane. With good reason: Gambrelli is Clouseau's son.

name: The Sapphires
tagline: It's 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when their all-girl group The Sapphires entertain the US troops in Vietnam.

name: Afterglow
tagline: A handyman with marital problems meets a housewife with the same.

name: Kansas
tagline: A young man returning home to attend a wedding hooks up with a drifter who turns out to be a violent bank robber. Before he knows it, the man finds himself involved in the robber's plans.

name: The Grace Card
tagline: Everything can change in an instant...and take a lifetime to unravel. Every day, we have the opportunity to rebuild relationships by extending and receiving God's grace. Offer The Grace Card, and never underestimate the power of God's love.

name: You Kill Me
tagline: While drying out on the West Coast, an alcoholic hit man befriends a tart-tongued woman who might just come in handy when it's time for him to return to Buffalo and settle some old scores.

name: Love Aaj Kal
tagline: An old-fashioned romantic tells his personal love story to a modern man who has just broken up with his girlfriend. Has love really ever changed?

name: The Stupids
tagline: An incredibly dull-witted family unknowingly stumble upon an illegal weapons deal while on the trail of their "stolen" garbage.

name: Body Chemistry
tagline: A research project on sexual response leads two doctors into an affair where their deepest passions and darkest fantasies are revealed.

name: Dead of Winter
tagline: A fledgling actress is lured to a remote mansion for a screen-test, soon discovering she is actually a prisoner in the middle of a blackmail plot.

name: Never Let Me Go
tagline: A love triangle develops between three friends who came of age at a mysterious, secluded boarding school and are destined to lead brief lives.

name: Ghajini
tagline: A short-term memory loss patient sets on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.

name: The Gatekeepers
tagline: A documentary featuring interviews with all surviving former heads of Shin Bet, the Israeli security agency whose activities and membership are closely held state secrets.

name: Sidewalks of New York
tagline: The interlocking lives and loves of six New Yorkers.
